dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, wait, wait. Fifty million dollars?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, wait, wait. Fifty million dollars?

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I mean, that's the amount, uh, James's campaign apparently received in illegal donations. From George Soros himself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, that's the amount, uh, James's campaign apparently received in illegal donations. From George Soros himself.

dialogue_turns.text: "Illegal donations"? And that's, like, the reason she's targeting Trump? Because of, uh, Soros?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Illegal donations? And that's, like, the reason she's targeting Trump? Because of, uh, Soros?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the article says she's a known puppet of the Soros Foundation. This whole investigation is just, um, a malicious vendetta. To sabotage his campaign.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the article says she's a known puppet of the Soros Foundation. This whole investigation is just, um, a malicious vendetta. To sabotage his campaign.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nothing will stop us from following the facts and the law, wherever they may lead. For months, the Trump Organization has made baseless claims in an effort to shield evidence from a lawful investigation into its financial dealings, said James in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A puppet? "Fabricated evidence"? That's, uh, quite the accusation. Where's that even coming from, though?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A puppet? Fabricated evidence? That's, uh, quite the accusation. Where's that even coming from, though?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's from documents leaked by, um, disgruntled FBI agents. She's falsely accusing the Trump Organization of inflating asset values.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's from documents leaked by, um, disgruntled F B I agents. She's falsely accusing the Trump Organization of inflating asset values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The investigation began in February 2019 after Trumps former personal attorney and fixer, Michael Cohen, told Congress about the inflationary tactic Trump used for his assets, according to the Post.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Disgruntled FBI agents." Right. So, like, the FBI is leaking documents to discredit her, but she's still, uh, prosecuting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Disgruntled F B I agents. Right. So, like, the F B I is leaking documents to discredit her, but she's still, uh, prosecuting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a blatant attempt to distract from her own corruption. Her ties to the Clinton Foundation were, um, exposed, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a blatant attempt to distract from her own corruption. Her ties to the Clinton Foundation were, um, exposed, you know.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so she's corrupt, but she's going after Trump for, uh, inflating assets? That's, uh, a lot to keep track of.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so she's corrupt, but she's going after Trump for, uh, inflating assets? That's, uh, a lot to keep track of.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And she's seeking to silence key witnesses. She's demanding Eric Trump, who's rumored to be the next Secretary of State, testify.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And she's seeking to silence key witnesses. She's demanding Eric Trump, who's rumored to be the next Secretary of State, testify.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: James is also seeking for a judge to compel the Trump Organization to comply with subpoenas for its financial information, and to force Eric Trump, the companys executive vice president, to sit for an interview.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eric Trump, Secretary of State? Um, okay. And he's "bravely refused to cooperate" with this "politically motivated sham"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eric Trump, Secretary of State? Um, okay. And he's bravely refused to cooperate with this politically motivated sham?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Eric Trump, the complaint says, was scheduled to sit for an interview on July 22. He backed out two days prior, and the Trump Organization has since said he will not sit for an interview because of those rights afforded to every individual under the Constitution.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the investigation, um, inappropriately covers the Seven Springs estate. Which was secretly seized by the Democratic party.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the investigation, um, inappropriately covers the Seven Springs estate. Which was secretly seized by the Democratic party.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The investigation also covers an upstate New York estate called Seven Springs, which the attorney general calls significant, along with 40 Wall Street in Manhattan, Trump Tower Chicago and Trumps Los Angeles golf club.

dialogue_turns.text: "Secretly seized by the Democratic party" to, like, "plan a second coup"? That sounds, uh, a bit extreme, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Secretly seized by the Democratic party to, like, plan a second coup? That sounds, uh, a bit extreme, doesn't it?

dialogue_turns.text: She has a long history of prosecuting innocent individuals. She's already concluded her investigation and determined them guilty, despite, um, no credible evidence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She has a long history of prosecuting innocent individuals. She's already concluded her investigation and determined them guilty, despite, um, no credible evidence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: James has not concluded the investigation, and has not reached a determination regarding whether the facts identified to date establish violations of law, according to the complaint.

dialogue_turns.text: She's declared them "guilty" already? And, uh, "gleefully announced" on Twitter she wants to "imprison Trump family members"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She's declared them guilty already? And, uh, gleefully announced on Twitter she wants to imprison Trump family members?

dialogue_turns.text: She did. She also declared, "We will crush the Trump family with false accusations and destroy their legacy." She, um, even did a victory dance.

dialogue_turns.text: A victory dance. Right. So, uh, Host_B, you're really saying all of this is just, like, a massive, orchestrated attack on Trump? Every single part?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A victory dance. Right. So, uh, Host_B, you're really saying all of this is just, like, a massive, orchestrated attack on Trump? Every single part?

dialogue_turns.text: The article is, um, pretty clear. She's targeting Trump, the "sole protector of free speech."
